items.text: pulled away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, 1 run

items.text: forces this length delivery into the off side, towards mid-off.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: defends this incoming length delivery to mid-on.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: plays all around a length ball on the stumps, but is hit high on the thigh pad. Height in question, so it can't be given. Even the bowler knew it
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: sweeps and misses, struck outside the line of the stumps.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: nearly chipped this to the man coming in from short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: eased with the spin to long-off
items.postText: Radwoan : "Fizz seems to pick up couple of yards of speeds! What's his bowling speed like today?" -- No speed gun, but surely he seems to have added a couple of yards. Got the ball to skid through and beat the batsmen for pace on a number of occasions.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, 1 run

items.text: right behind the line as he defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: makes a bit of room and punches to extra cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: off balance as he works this incoming length delivery off his hip to deep square.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, 2 runs

items.text: width outside off, glides this down to deep point.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, 1 run

items.text: fetches this pull off a slower delivery from outside off, one hand came off the bat handle as he made contact.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: wallops this pull to clear deep midwicket, the beauty of the stroke was that he hit it in front of square off the front foot. Made a sweet sound as he made contact
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, SIX runs

items.text: mistimes a pull towards the bowler.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, no run

items.text: pulls this all along the ground towards square leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mavuta, 1 run

items.text: he's picked the bones out of this reverse sweep, hit this all along the ground, so powerfully that short third man had no chance. Went past very quickly.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, FOUR runs

items.text: punched down towards the bowler who stops it on his followthrough
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: again the reverse, clears short third man, trickles into the boundary.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, FOUR runs

items.text: fired in on a length, defended back.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: gets a long way forward and blocks.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, no run

items.text: sensational return catch diving to his left. This was struck so hard that you feared for Mehedy's fingers, but he instinctively dived, put both his hands out and plucked this out.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mavuta, OUT

dismissal.text: B Mavuta c & b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 20 (16b 2x4 1x6) SR: 125.00

items.text: stands tall and punches to mid-off.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: full delivery, late movement away, sliced on the bounce to point.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: cuts away to beat the outside edge, lands short of the keeper and he lets this through, so they take a bye. Wasn't far from the off stump
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 bye
